mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, notice_name, notice_link, create_time, notice_priority, notice_enable_status, notice_img, last_edit_time FROM tb_notice ORDER BY notice_priority LIMIT #{rowIndex},#{pageSize}
SELECT notice_id, notice_name, notice_link, create_time, notice_priority, notice_enable_status, notice_img, last_edit_time FROM tb_notice WHERE notice_enable_status=1 ORDER BY notice_priority
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_notice ( notice_link, create_time, notice_priority, notice_enable_status, notice_img, last_edit_time ) VALUES ( #{noticeLink}, #{createTime}, #{noticePriority}, #{noticeEnableStatus}, #{noticeImg}, #{lastEditTime} )
